mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `COMMENT` (user_id, product_id, order_detail_id, rating, comment) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{orderDetailId}, #{rating}, #{comment})
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id AS commentId, c.user_id AS userId, u.name AS user_name, c.rating, c.comment, DATE_FORMAT(c.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS created_at FROM `COMMENT` c JOIN `USER` u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM `COMMENT` WHERE comment_id = #{commentId} AND user_id = #{userId}
